headline: KKR Launches European Rail Leasing Platform with Green Mobility Partners
summary: FRANKFURT, Germany, December 22, 2025--Green Mobility Partners ("GMP"), a Vienna-based electric locomotive leasing company, and KKR, a leading global investment firm, today announced a strategic partnership to create a leading European rail leasing platform to meet growing demand for sustainable rail infrastructure across Europe.

content.title: KKR Launches European Rail Leasing Platform with Green Mobility Partners
